ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would recommend this course for someone looking for an introduction to understanding the phenomenon of prophecy in the ancient world.

This class gave a survey of information on prophecy in a variety of contexts with a focus on the Hebrew bible. I would recommend it because it suits students from a wide variety of backgrounds and gives an interesting lens through which one can examine religious phenomena.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The course provided great tools for approaching ancient texts from a sociological standpoint. I left the course with more questions for my continued studies.

This course brought the text itself to the forefront. Both abstract frameworks and textual data were covered, but the fleshing out of individual passages helped remind me of the vitality of the text itself.
